api_list.name: Facebook Ad Copy

required_parameters.name: description
required_parameters.default: Apple designs, manufactures and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories, and sells a variety of related services.

test_endpoint: There's never been a better time to buy a Mac.
You asked for it, and Apple delivered.
Enjoy all the benefits of owning an Apple product.
Why settle for one device when you can have a life-changing experience? Apple.
